name: claude-session-recorder
description: Claude Code CLI Session Recorder - TypeScript 实现
author: Claude Session Recorder Plugin

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:hooks
scripts.package:hooks: pkg src/hooks/user-prompt-hook.ts --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output hooks-bin/user-prompt-hook && pkg src/hooks/tool-result-hook.ts --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output hooks-bin/tool-result-hook && pkg src/hooks/session-end-hook.ts --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output hooks-bin/session-end-hook
